## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)

## Verification

- [ ] `npm run verify` passes locally (typecheck + lint + test + build + pack)
- [ ] Tests added/updated for new functionality
- [ ] No breaking export changes (or marked as breaking)
- [ ] All exports map to valid files in `dist/`

## Documentation

- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated (if needed)
- [ ] Code comments added/updated (if needed)

## Release checklist

- [ ] If this PR changes public behavior or API, a Changeset was added (`npx changeset`)
- [ ] No breaking changes without a major bump
- [ ] README or docs updated if required

## Checklist

- [ ] Follows existing code style and patterns
- [ ] Self-review completed
